title: Empty Strings
description: Return what you say when you hand the cookie other, using the person's name if you know it.

tasks.name: Get things working with a single string

tests.name: no name given
tests.expected: One for you, one for me.

tasks.name: Get things working with a name

tests.name: A name is given
tests.expected: One for Alice, one for me.

tests.name: Another name is given
tests.expected: One for Bob, one for me.
